blogs.title: Designing a Typewriter React Component
blogs.description: We are pretty much familiar with the Typewriter effect, although we might not be acquainted with a Typewriter. In words, the typewriter effect is the gradual revealing of the words as if it is being typed infront of our eyes with sound of a typewriter key
